ComicInfo.Title: Midnight Massacre Part 2 - Hunters
ComicInfo.Summary: Blade continues his killing spree, claiming the lives of a few witches, as Demogoblin continues his own, both working to cleanse the planet of all supernatural energies. Demogoblin catches wind of Blade's mission, and decides to try to form an alliance. Ghost Rider and Frank Drake work together to stop Demogoblin as well as Blade, and Blade declines Demogoblin's offer, instead killing him and draining his energy. Frank and Ghost Rider ultimately are forced to flee from the supercharged Blade.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 12:15:11. [CVDB66455]
ComicInfo.Writer: Howard Mackie, Barry Dutter, Rick Parker
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ron Garney, Barry Dutter, Rick Parker, Ron Garney
ComicInfo.Inker: Chris Ivy, Barry Dutter, Rick Parker
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Chris Ivy, Gregory Wright, Ron Garney
ComicInfo.Editor: Bobbie Chase, Matt Morra, Tom DeFalco
ComicInfo.Characters: Blade, Demogoblin, Frank Drake, Ghost Rider (Ketch), Noble Kale, Seer
